entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
